data.lyric:
[ti:coney island]
[ar:Taylor Swift/The National]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]coney island - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)/The National
[00:01.54]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Bryce Dessner/Taylor Swift/William Bowery
[00:03.08]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Bryce Dessner/Taylor Swift/William Bowery
[00:04.62]Taylor Swift：
[00:18.67]Break my soul in two looking for you
[00:22.11]But you're right here
[00:27.32]If I can't relate to you anymore
[00:30.63]Then who am I related to
[00:36.30]And if this is the long haul
[00:39.73]How'd we get here so soon
[00:45.33]Did I close my fist around something delicate
[00:48.87]Did I shatter you
[00:53.53]And I'm sitting on a bench in Coney Island wondering where did my baby go
[01:00.13]The fast times the bright lights the merry go
[01:04.68]Sorry for not making you my centerfold
[01:10.54]Over and over
[01:13.75]Lost again with no surprises
[01:16.01]Disappointments close your eyes
[01:18.05]And it gets colder and colder
[01:23.38]When the sun goes down
[01:27.01]Matt Berninger/Taylor Swift：
[01:28.10]
[01:34.07]The question pounds my head
[01:36.62]"What's a lifetime of achievement"
[01:42.85]If I pushed you to the edge
[01:44.92]But you were too polite to leave me
[01:52.09]Do you miss the rogue
[01:53.62]Who coaxed you into paradise and left you there
[01:57.65]
[02:01.02]Will you forgive my soul
[02:02.46]When you're too wise to trust me and too old to care
[02:09.08]'Cause we were like the mall before the Internet
[02:12.55]It was the one place to be
[02:16.05]The mischief the gift wrapped suburban dreams
[02:19.77]Taylor Swift/Matt Berninger：
[02:20.40]Sorry for not winning you an arcade ring
[02:24.16]
[02:26.05]Over and over
[02:29.40]Lost again with no surprises
[02:31.40]Disappointments close your eyes
[02:33.49]And it gets colder and colder
[02:38.97]When the sun goes down
[02:45.64]Were you waiting at our old spot
[02:47.84]In the tree line
[02:48.95]By the gold clock
[02:50.03]Did I leave you hanging every single day
[02:54.48]Were you standing in the hallway
[02:56.58]With a big cake happy birthday
[02:58.98]Did I paint your bluest skies the darkest gray
[03:01.65]A universe away
[03:04.07]And when I got into the accident
[03:06.79]The sight that flashed before me was your face
[03:12.96]But when I walked up to the podium
[03:15.66]I think that I forgot to say your name
[03:19.09]Both：
[03:20.79]I'm on a bench in Coney Island wondering where did my baby go
[03:26.97]The fast times the bright lights the merry go
[03:31.43]Sorry for not making you my centerfold
[03:37.08]Over and over
[03:40.50]Lost again with no surprises
[03:42.59]Disappointments close your eyes
[03:44.69]And it gets colder and colder
[03:50.07]When the sun goes down
[03:54.57]When the sun goes down
[04:00.10]The sight that flashed before me was your face
[04:03.38]When the sun goes down
[04:09.00]But I think that I forgot to say your name
[04:12.46]Over and over
[04:18.13]Sorry for not making you my
[04:21.71]Making you my
[04:23.84]Making you my centerfold
data.trans:
[ti:coney island]
[ar:Taylor Swift/The National]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.54]//
[00:03.08]//
[00:04.62]//
[00:18.67]我费尽心思寻找你
[00:22.11]但你就在我面前
[00:27.32]如果我不能再和你心心相惜
[00:30.63]那我能对谁诉说
[00:36.30]如果这是很漫长的旅途
[00:39.73]那我们怎么能这么快就到达
[00:45.33]是否是我太过执着于这脆弱的情感？
[00:48.87]是否是我伤害到了你？
[00:53.53]我坐在科尼岛的长椅上 想知道我的宝贝去了哪儿
[01:00.13]快乐时光 阳光耀眼 旋转木马
[01:04.68]抱歉 没有把你变成我最重要的人
[01:10.54]一次又一次
[01:13.75]又迷失了 毫无意外
[01:16.01]真是失望 闭上你的眼睛
[01:18.05]气温越来越低
[01:23.38]太阳慢慢落下
[01:27.01]//
[01:28.10]
[01:34.07]这个问题让我头痛
[01:36.62]一生的成就有何意义
[01:42.85]如果我把你逼到崩溃
[01:44.92]但你太善良 不忍离开我
[01:52.09]你想念那个无赖吗
[01:53.62]那个把你骗去天堂 然后把你丢在那里的无赖
[01:57.65]
[02:01.02]你会不会原谅我
[02:02.46]当你精明到不再相信我 成熟到不再在意我时
[02:09.08]因为我们就像网络出现之前的商场
[02:12.55]还算是一个值得去的地方
[02:16.05]恶作剧 乏味的梦想 精心包装
[02:19.77]//
[02:20.40]抱歉 没能为你赢得一枚戒指
[02:24.16]
[02:26.05]一次又一次
[02:29.40]又迷失了 毫无意外
[02:31.40]真是失望 闭上你的眼睛
[02:33.49]气温越来越低
[02:38.97]太阳慢慢落下
[02:45.64]你是不是在我们原来的地方等候
[02:47.84]树林边
[02:48.95]金钟旁
[02:50.03]我是不是每天都让你干等着
[02:54.48]你是不是站在大厅里
[02:56.58]端着大大的蛋糕 生日快乐
[02:58.98]我是不是把你最蓝的天空涂成了最暗的灰色
[03:01.65]相隔着银河的距离
[03:04.07]当我遭遇意外的时候
[03:06.79]眼前闪过的是你的脸庞
[03:12.96]但当我走上领奖台时
[03:15.66]我好像忘记了提起你的名字
[03:19.09]//
[03:20.79]我在科尼岛的长椅上 想知道我的宝贝去了哪儿
[03:26.97]快乐时光 阳光耀眼 旋转木马
[03:31.43]抱歉 没有把你变成我最重要的人
[03:37.08]一次又一次
[03:40.50]又迷失了 毫无意外
[03:42.59]真是失望 闭上你的眼睛
[03:44.69]气温越来越低
[03:50.07]太阳慢慢落下
[03:54.57]太阳慢慢落下
[04:00.10]眼前闪过的是你的脸庞
[04:03.38]太阳慢慢落下
[04:09.00]但我觉得我忘记了提起你的名字
[04:12.46]一次又一次
[04:18.13]抱歉 没有把你变成
[04:21.71]把你变成
[04:23.84]把你变成我最重要的人
